field.name: summary
field.value: Add a [Parent] attribute for use on [Nested] classes

field.name: description
field.value:
<component name="Nested" class=Tests, "NestedComponent, Tests"> *** <parent name="Parent" /> *** <property name="NestedProperty" type="String" /> </component>
This is not implemented in AR.
From http://www.hibernate.org/hib_docs/nhibernate/html_single/#mapping-declaration-component
"The <component> element allows a <parent> subelement that maps a property of the component class as a reference back to the containing entity."
